mapper.select: select contract_id,contract_serial, merchant_name,phone,first_date,username from mcgctcc_contract where status = 1
mapper.insert: insert into mcgctcc_contract ( contract_id , contract_serial , merchant_name , address , area1 , area2 , rental_location , building_area , expires , year_start , month_start , day_start , year_end , month_end , day_end , transfer_year , transfer_month , transfer_day , payment1 , payment2 , payment3 , payment4 , purpose , rent1 , upper2 , upper3 , cash_deposit , lease_year , lease_month , lease_day , first_agent , first_date , second_sign , second_agent , phone , second_date , status , username ) values ( #{contract_id ,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contract_serial ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchant_name ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area1 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area2 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rental_location ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{building_area ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expires ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year_start ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{month_start ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{day_start ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year_end ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{month_end ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{day_end ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transfer_year ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transfer_month ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transfer_day ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payment1 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payment2 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payment3 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payment4 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purpose ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rent1 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upper2 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upper3 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cash_deposit ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lease_year ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lease_month ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lease_day ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{first_agent ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{first_date ,jdbcType=DATE}, #{second_sign ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{second_agent ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{second_date ,jdbcType=DATE}, #{status ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mcgctcc_contract SET contract_serial = #{contract_serial ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, merchant_name = #{merchant_name ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area1 = #{area1 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area2 = #{area2 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rental_location = #{rental_location ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, building_area = #{building_area ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expires = #{expires ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, year_start = #{year_start ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, month_start = #{month_start ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, day_start = #{day_start ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, year_end = #{year_end ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, month_end = #{month_end ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, day_end = #{day_end ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transfer_year = #{transfer_year ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transfer_month = #{transfer_month ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transfer_day = #{transfer_day ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment1 = #{payment1 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment2 = #{payment2 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment3 = #{payment3 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment4 = #{payment4 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purpose = #{purpose ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rent1 = #{rent1 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upper2 = #{upper2 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upper3 = #{upper3 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cash_deposit = #{cash_deposit ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lease_year = #{lease_year ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lease_month = #{lease_month ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lease_day = #{lease_day ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, first_agent = #{first_agent ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, first_date = #{first_date ,jdbcType=DATE}, second_sign = #{second_sign ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, second_agent = #{second_agent ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, second_date = #{second_date ,jdbcType=DATE}, status = #{status ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE contract_id = #{contract_id ,jdbcType=INTEGER}
